name: Quantum Freezics
description:
This is an Entry for the Level Up Circle Jam. This is an unfinished version, still dealing with the UI. designing more levels and animating the player.

To play Download, unzip, and then run QuantumFreezics.exe. 

If you get stuck please restart the game, haven't implemented a restart yet. 

Only buttons that work on the main menu are Start and Exit. 

Please let me know if you experience any or leave any suggestions. 

My friend designed the main character : https://www.instagram.com/guiguiri
